sentence.Network_en: They defined simply by a dichotomous division within the upper, middle, and lower classes.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们简单地用一种两分法划为上 、 中 、 下等阶级.

sentence.Network_en: His Flore Francoise contained an analytical method, closely similar to the dichotomous keys of modern Floras.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在《法国植物志》中提出了一个与当代植物志上使用的二岐检索表很类似的分析方法.

sentence.Network_en: The 2 test and Student t test were used to compare dichotomous and continuous variables, respectively.
sentence.Network_cn: 分别用卡方检验和T检验比较两分法变量与连续变量.
